segments.text: I notice the woman so absorbed in her dish drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got that towel wrapped around the plate perfectly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink's overflowing, and she's missing it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's spilling onto the floor, making everything slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are trying to get cookies behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on that stool looks so precarious up there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move, and he'll tumble down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's waiting patiently, but this feels wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a beautiful garden, so serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's heartbreaking how unaware the mom is of the dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene just makes me feel a deep sense of worry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies might not be worth the risk they're taking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Poor things, caught up in their little secret.
segments.speaker: PAR
